pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flexible Mediation Analysis Using Natural Effect Models // Run flexible mediation analyses using natural effect models as described in Lange, Vansteelandt and Bekaert (2012) DOI:10.1093/aje/kwr525, Vansteelandt, Bekaert and Lange (2012) DOI:10.1515/2161-962X.1014 and Loeys, Moerkerke, De Smet, Buysse, Steen and Vansteelandt (2013) DOI:10.1080/00273171.2013.832132.
